Class AnnotationUtils

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class AnnotationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    AnnotationUtils is a utility class for annotations.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnnotatedFields

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Field> getAnnotatedFields(java.lang.Class annotation,
                                                                         java.lang.Class clazz)
        Method getAnnotatedFields gets the fields annotated of a specific type from the class and its parent classes.
        The List is in order of closest parent => current obj fields, parent obj fields, etc.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation type
        clazz - the class that is expected to be annotated
        Returns:
        a Set of Field objects annotated with the annotatedClass

      • getAnnotatedField

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.reflect.Field> getAnnotatedField(java.lang.Class annotation,
                                                                            java.lang.Class clazz)
        Method getAnnotatedField gets the first annotated field of the type of annotation specified.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the type of the annotation
        clazz - the annotated class
        Returns:
        the first annotated field found in clazz of the type annotation

      • getAnnotatedMethods

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> getAnnotatedMethods(java.lang.Class annotation,
                                                                           java.lang.Class clazz)
        Method getAnnotatedMethods gets the methods annotated of a specific type from the class and its parent classes.
        The List is in order of closest parent => current obj methods, parent obj methods, etc.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the type of the annotation
        clazz - the annotated class
        Returns:
        a List of Methods that have been annotated using annotation in the class clazz

      • getAnnotatedMethod

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.reflect.Method> getAnnotatedMethod(java.lang.Class annotation,
                                                                              java.lang.Class clazz)
        Method getAnnotatedMethod the first annotated method of the type of annotation specified.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the type of the annotation
        clazz - the annotated class
        Returns:
        the first annotated field found in clazz of the type annotation

      • getAnnotation

        public static <A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> A getAnnotation(java.lang.Class<A> annotation,
                                                                          java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Method getAnnotation returns the annotation on a class or its parent annotation.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the type of the annotation
        Parameters:
        clazz - the annotated class
        annotation - the annotation to find
        Returns:
        the actual annotation used or null if it doesn't exist
